title: Christian Reformed Church Synod 2018 Recap
description:
The Synod of the Christian Reformed Church is the broadest assembly of the denomination. Every year delegates from the US and Canada gather to hear reports and deliberate matters pertaining to the denomination. I interviewed three pastors for their reflections on the gathering that ended last week. 

Rod Hugen pastor of The Village in Tucson AZ
Richard Bodini pastor of Holland Marsh CRC in Ontario CA
Rob Toornstra pastor of Sunnyslope CRC in Salem OR

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
